// The output should be saved and turned in as a text file 
// called <COHHORTNAME>.PART2.txt

Decoder: 
Dec Input:	0000
Dec Output:	0000000000000001

Encoder:
Enc Input:	0000000001000000
Enc Output:	0110

32-bit MUX:
select1 ||| select2 ||| Select3  ||| mux1  ||||  mux 2 ||| mux3
|0000010000000000|00000100|00010|||00000100011100000100010000000000||01000110000000000100010000000000||||01000100000000000100010000000000|
|0000000000000001|00000001|00001|||10000000000000001000000000000000||10000000000000001000000000000000||||10000000000000001000000000000000|
|0000000000000010|00000010|00010|||01000100000000000100010000000000||01000100000000000100010000000000||||01000100000000000100010000000000|
|0000000000000100|00000100|00100|||01000110000000000100010000000000||01000110000000000100010000000000||||01000110000000000100010000000000|
|1000000000000000|10000000|01000|||11111111000000000100010000000000||00000100000011000100010000000000||||00000100000011000100010000000000|
|0010000000000000|01000000|01000|||10000100010000000100010000000000||00000110001000000100010000000000||||00000100000011000100010000000000|

XOR:
|   i     |     j    | XOR
|0000000011111000|0000000101000111 |   0000000110111111


Multiplier:
||       A               |||         B         ||| High bits out put  ||  low bits output  ||    HighLow Dec
||0000000010011000|||0000101011010101|||0000000000000110||0110111001111000||    421496

Left Arbiter:
|| A      ||  LeftArbiter||
||0011011101100101||0000000000000001||
||0000000000000001||0000000000000001||

Right Arbiter:
|| A      ||  Right Arbiter||
||0011011100010100||0000000000000100||
||0000000000000001||0000000000000001||

Comparator:
||    A     ||    B    ||A<B|A=B|A>B|
||         1||         1||0||1|0|||
||         2||         1||0||0|1|||
||         2||         3||1||0|0|||
||         2||     16384||1||0|0|||
||     18496||      7392||0||0|1|||
||     24706||     24706||0||1|0|||


Full Adder:
||A    ||B    ||Cin||A+B||Cout
||0000000000001100||0000000000011000||0||0000000000100100||0
||A    ||B    ||Cin||A+B||Cout
||0100010010010101||0000101001011100||0||0100111011110001||0
||A    ||B    ||Cin||A+B||Cout
||0001111010111010||0000000000010110||0||0001111011010000||0

Subtractor:
||A           ||B      ||Cin||A+B  ||Cout(a+b)||Overflow||Cin2|A-B||Cout(a-b)|overflow
||0000000000001100||0000000000011000||0||0000000000100100||0||0|1111111111110100||1||0||0
||0100010010010101||0000101001011100||0||0100111011110001||0||0|0011101000111001||1||1||0
||0001111010111010||0000000000010110||0||0001111011010000||0||0|0001111010100100||1||1||0
||0000000000101000||0000001111101000||0||0000010000010000||0||0|1111110001000000||1||0||0
